nodes.text: Gloves were articles of clothing worn over hands, which provided protection of various kinds. Numerous types of specialized gloves existed. Heavier and larger gloves were usually called gauntlets.

Gloves were worn by members of the Krozurbian War Council. The Glove of Darth Vader was of particular note. The Jedi Consular Seenlu Kir wore gloves to conceal burns on her hands that she refused to have treated with bacta.
